verses.roman:
āra dui śloke advaita-tattvākhyāna
āra eka śloke pañca-tattvera vyākhyāna

synonyms: āra—further; dui śloke—in two verses; advaita—of Śrī Advaita Prabhu; tattva—of the truth; ākhyāna—description; āra—further; eka śloke—in one verse; pañca-tattvera—of the Pañca-tattva; vyākhyāna—explanation.
translation: The next two verses describe the truth of Advaita Prabhu, and the following verse describes the Pañca-tattva [the Lord, His plenary portion, His incarnation, His energies and His devotees].
